Reviews.Author: trvlnb3
Reviews.Content: Just received Note Pro yesterday and still in the process of setting up apps. This is my first tablet so I really can't add any details like the other reviews. I will update as I get further into the tablet. The only reason I give it a 4 star is due to the tablet not having the S pen feature. Wish I would have looked a little harder when researching the other tablets. Why would Samsung not put the S pen into this one like they did with the 10.1 2014 edition?? The only advantage right now that the Pro has over the 2014 edition is android software. Just a matter of time before Samsung updates that. More to come.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed with  poor video quality!
Reviews.Author: Collin
Reviews.Content: I have been waiting a few months to purchase this tablet.  I am replacing a first generation IPad and I was very excited to get the newest Galaxy Tab.  I use my Ipad for reading, surfing the web, Amazon Prime, Netflix, and HBOGO.  That is about it.  The tablet was amazing when I set it up.  It asked for my Google login during setup and had my calendar and email setup in seconds.  I love the layout and the feel of the tablet.  I actually loved everything about it except..... here it comes....watching videos. Amazon Prime isn't available for Android yet.  That leaves Netflix and HBOGO.  No matter what I did the video looked dark and the contrast was horrible.  Watching HBOGO gave my wife a headache.  The video was horrible quality.  I put it up to my IPad 1 and ran the same Netflix movie and the Ipad looked much better.  I guess the issues is with the 2 apps and not the device since I went through trouble shooting with Samsung and that is what the recommended I do, contact Netflix and HBO.  I scoured the internet and no one else had this issue.  I don’t understand.  The specs on this tablet are amazing.I was trying to get away from Apple so I first purchase the Kindle Fire HDX 8.9.  I actually loved the device,  but wanted a larger screen, Google integration, and freedom to use a different browser.  I have come to the conclusion that the IPad is the best tablet on the market and as soon as my money is credited I will purchase the IPad Air.Collin

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money.
Reviews.Author: Patricia Driscoll
Reviews.Content: Issue with tablet turning off during web searches and as I am using it. Sent back twice, still happening. Samsung customer service was not helpful.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy tab pro 10.1
Reviews.Author: Chandra
Reviews.Content: Got it from costco...screenwise excellent..no doubts on that..multitasking sucks..noticeable lag when switching..this is my second android tablet..the only problem that i see with any android tablet is the updates to the latest version..i had samsuing tab 8.0...God knows when i get updated to 4.4....

Reviews.Title: STOP STOP STOP!
Reviews.Author: CrazyAsian
Reviews.Content: Why would you buy this? This is exactly the same as the Galaxy Note 10.1. The only difference between these two devices is that the Note has a wacom digitzer. Why would you not get the Note instead? The wacom digitizer is fantastic and does a great job at letting you take HAND WRITTEN notes, annotate PDF's in a HAND WRITTEN fashion, draw on a high resolution screen!Why would you buy this tablet instead? There's not wacom pen support...Please do research about the Galaxy Note 10.1 2014 edition before you get this!I'm currently an owner of the galaxy note 10.1 2014 edition, these two tablets look the same. The note has more ram, but the note does not have kitkat. If a tablet doesn't have a wacom digitizer then it pretty much lacks one of the most important factors of a tablet. The ability to do all the signing, writing, note taking, DIGITALLY LIKE ON A DIGITAL PIECE OF PAPER.Please, don't get this unless you've looked at galaxy note 10.1 2014 edition.Edit:Look at the pricing for both these tablets as of 2-17-14. The note 10.1 2014 edition for 16 gb is 500 dollars. It has digital pen, it has 3 gb of ram, and is 80 grams heavier. Look at the new pro tab 10.1 16 gb edition. It is also 500 dollars, NO pen support, and has 2 gb of ram. It is 80 grams lighter.Do the math in your head, you are getting less by buying this tablet. People are getting mad at this post since they are looking at this AFTER they bought the pro 10.1. And to try to make themselves justified, they throw out stupid arguments.YOU ARE GETTING LESS, IF YOU BUY THIS TABLET, PERIOD.I understand this is not a true review of the tab, this was never mean't to be. This was to inform consumers that samsung is selling two tablets at the same price, but one lacks the pen.Double Edit:Kitkat came out for the Note 10.1, so you have the same OS on both tablets now. Although, this tablet did drop to 400$. It should be 200$ though, seriously...

Reviews.Title: worst tablet on the market not wort it
Reviews.Author: arturo
Reviews.Content: This is crap I bought this thing to enjoy social media,  you cant play any video on facebook, I was somewhat happy but this just kill it for me, there is small nick in the corner of the screen and I took it back, but they won't accept it back because of it, but the little nick was there when I opened,  I didn't care cause I was going to put a protective case anyways, but is going to Craigslist, so it doesn't matter, I will never buy another samsung product, ever again,

Reviews.Title: Amzaing Screen, poor device
Reviews.Author: Robert Vardell
Reviews.Content: The screen on this device is only surpassed by the 12.2 Pro yet that cannot overcome for the performance degradation caused by the bloated OS and features added to try and bombard you with "stuff". I am not an engineer,but the sluggishness of nearly everything I do on the device simply makes is something that will be added to my shelf collection, which also houses the Touchpad and the Playbook and my original ipad.

Reviews.Title: BUGGY DEFECTIVE MESS score is 0 for 2!
Reviews.Author: DEALHUNTER
Reviews.Content: I awaited this to become available like a kid waiting for Xmas and was able to pick one(two) up at my local Best buy this today.Now that I've got my hands on one and then another one, they were both just incredibly defective at best. Spent two hours trying to get far enough along to look for an update on the first one but it kept crashing, with non stop force close messages and random reboots to factory settings every 30-45 seconds. Put all info back in again and ....same thing! Nightmare!Second unit to replace the first stayed on long enough to download the update 14.4mb that take almost 30 minutes on my super high speed WiFi and then hung up on a startup to "installing updates" logo/screen that just loops infinitely. I am soooo frustrated!I can't believe this is happening. I have never had this many problems with a tablet in my life let alone all from one! I will go back to the store one more time and if that's defective too, I give up. I desperately want this thing to work but NOTHING DOES! NOTHING.I was able to snap off a picture on the second between crash to factory reboots cycles and I can say that it was the nicest quality picture I've ever seen a tablet take....though I can't say ANYTHING else good about this frustrating piece of dissapointment.It is currently stuck in a boot installing updates cycle that will not stop. The tablet is boiling hot and will not turn off no matter what I do, I had to stick it in a metal cooking pot in case it explodes or starts on fire, this is not a joke.I am waiting for the hidden cameras to appear to see who's punked me but I'm starting to think this is reality after all. I've never seen anything so bizzare in my life, its crazier than a phone after a fresh swim in the toilet.Just a warning for what it's worth. I'm interested to see if there is a flock of other people who are also going through this??Will update tomorrow....
